Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
NSInvocation(Quick)A category on NSInvocation to return a simple invocation without much code
SSYAlertThis class provides a "shared" (singleton) alert dialog which is similar to Apple's NSRunXXXXAlert but has additional features
SSYLabelledListThis class provides a control which consists of a non-editable NSTextField label and, below it, a non-editable list of strings (choices), displayed in an NSScrollView+NSTableView. The height of the scroll/table is adjusted to fit the content, up to a given maximum table height
SSYLabelledPopUpThis class provides a control which consists of a non-editable NSTextField label and, below it, a popup button
SSYLabelledTextFieldThis class provides a control which consists of two text fields, a non-editable key field and, below it, an editable value field
SSYMailtoThis class contains a single method which creates a plain-text email message
SSYVersionStruct_structThe struct which underlies the SSYVersionTriplet class
SSYVersionTripletA triplet of integers, as in major.minor.bugFix, describing the version of an application or other project
